sourcesContent:
import moment from 'moment'

const getCurrentForecast = (name, dt, weather) => ({
    day: moment(dt * 1000).format('dddd'),
    date: moment(dt * 1000).format('MMMM Do'),
    location: name,
    icon: `http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/${weather.icon}`,
    description: weather.main
})

export default getCurrentForecast
